sentence.Network_en: Mr Brooke is an extremely affable and approachable man.
sentence.Network_cn: 布鲁克先生极为谦和，平易近人。

sentence.Network_en: Forrest was normally mild-mannered, affable, and untalkative.
sentence.Network_cn: 福里斯特通常态度温和、待人亲切、少言寡语。

sentence.Network_en: Murray was an affable, free-spirited man.
sentence.Network_cn: 默里是个温和友善、无拘无束的人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 和字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 和蔼〖 kindly;affable〗 和蔼可亲〖 affable;genial〗 和风〖 moderatebreeze〗.
龙崎樱乃_百度百科 ... Kiddy—— 小孩 Affable—— 和蔼可亲的（affable） Kittenish—— 小猫似的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... fabulist n 寓言作者 affable a 温和的；和蔼的 effable a 能表达出来的.
英语构词法研究之一：A|英语单词构词法 ... adulterate 搀混,使品质低落 affable 和蔼可亲,殷勤的 affiliate 联合,加入,加盟.

list.abs: he found her parents very affable ., 他觉得她父母很好说话.

good appearance and manner , flexible and have strong affability .形象气质较好，头脑灵活，具有较强亲和力。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Old French from Latin affabilis, from the verb affari, from ad- 'to' + fari 'speak'

entry.def: Someone who is affable is pleasant and friendly.

example.ex: Mr Brooke is an extremely affable and approachable man.
example.tran: 布鲁克先生极为谦和，平易近人。

auth_sentence.content: One of the most affable and humble on the British team.
auth_sentence.res_content: One of the most affable and humble on the British team.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One of the most affable and humble on the British team.

auth_sentence.content: He was affable and friendly with foreign journalists in those days.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was affable and friendly with foreign journalists in those days.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was affable and friendly with foreign journalists in those days.

auth_sentence.content: I like to think I am accessible, affable and empathetic.
auth_sentence.res_content: I like to think I am accessible, affable and empathetic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I like to think I am accessible, affable and empathetic.

stems_affixes.word_buile: af接近+fable=fabl说话→不断可以说话→亲切

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能被说出的, 可表达的

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+effable[adj.能被说出的, 可表达的]→adj.妙不可言的,说不出的

means.word_mean: 平易近人的, 和蔼的

sentences.en: He is an affable man, always willing to stop and talk.
sentences.cn: 他是一个和蔼的人, 总是乐于停下来与人交谈。

sentences.en: The chairman was quite affable at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 主席在会议上非常和蔼可亲。
